explanations.reason: The paper focuses on assessing the impact of innovation (measured by R&D investment and patents) on sales performance and financial returns using risk factor models (3-factor, 4-factor, and 5-factor models) and rolling-regression methods. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related concepts in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in financial and econometric analysis rather than machine learning or artificial intelligence.
